title: OverflowError: Python int too large to convert to C long
body:
Hi,
thanks for this amazing library!

**Describe the bug**
I created a dataset by myself from a Scopus search and transformed it so that it can be interpreted by ASReview.
The dataset can be uploaded without any issues.
I know this is not an issue of ASReview itself, I assume that the issue is within the dataset, but I am not able to figure out why the overflow error appears.

**To Reproduce**
Upload the dataset and follow the instructions. The dataset is added as attachment.

**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38472982/166891141-286780b4-4cbe-421d-9d63-820b99485c75.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38472982/166890566-66385a8e-cb41-406d-a6cb-4ea3fd8c632f.png)

**Version information**
 - OS: Windows
 - ASReview version 0.19.1

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
[220505_Scopus_data.csv](https://github.com/asreview/asreview/files/8629829/220505_Scopus_data.csv)
